name: Future Theater
description: In this game, players can enjoy the stage of each character in the scene and the melody of the music from different angles. Players will follow the lens of the camera to appreciate from all angles. In addition, players can also pick up drumsticks on the interview drum stand to beat drums in the scene, and interact with the rhythm of the music. Players will follow the steps one by one to enjoy the four stages and four different dance performances in the scene. Each stage in the scene has its own sense of the camera. Watch the stage of the characters up close and experience it to the fullest! ! !
